Sentencas: We report the synthesis of a nanocomposite solid electrolyte, (1 - x)Bi2O3-Gd2O3:xCeO(2) (GDBC), made up of ceria-embedded gadolinium-stabilized bismuth oxide (Bi2O3-Gd2O3, GDB) for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cell (LT-SOFC) applications.
Titulo: The fabrication of a highly conductive ceria-embedded gadolinium-stabilized bismuth oxide nanocomposite solid electrolyte for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Different compositions of (1 - x)Bi2O3-Gd2O3:xCeO(2) (where 0 <= x <= 50 wt%) were fabricated using a solid-state method.
Titulo: The fabrication of a highly conductive ceria-embedded gadolinium-stabilized bismuth oxide nanocomposite solid electrolyte for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Detailed structural analysis of the nanocomposite solid electrolyte samples was done using SEM, TEM, XRD, and FT-IR techniques.
Titulo: The fabrication of a highly conductive ceria-embedded gadolinium-stabilized bismuth oxide nanocomposite solid electrolyte for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The incorporation of CeO2 nanofiller enhances the ionic conductivity relative to Bi2O3-Gd2O3 nanocomposite solid electrolyte via creating new routes for oxygen-ion conduction within the parent network.
Titulo: The fabrication of a highly conductive ceria-embedded gadolinium-stabilized bismuth oxide nanocomposite solid electrolyte for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Among the different compositions of nanocomposite material, GDBC with 40 wt% CeO2 nanofiller shows the maximum ionic conductivity, i.e., sigma = 7.56 x 10(-2)
Titulo: The fabrication of a highly conductive ceria-embedded gadolinium-stabilized bismuth oxide nanocomposite solid electrolyte for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: S cm(-1), and lowest activation energy (0.0954 eV) at low temperature (340 degrees C).
Titulo: The fabrication of a highly conductive ceria-embedded gadolinium-stabilized bismuth oxide nanocomposite solid electrolyte for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Notably, challenges preventing the commercialization of LT-SOFCs include material conductivity, safety, and production costs.
Titulo: The fabrication of a highly conductive ceria-embedded gadolinium-stabilized bismuth oxide nanocomposite solid electrolyte for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Hence, this superionic nanocomposite solid electrolyte with 40 wt% CeO2, having high conductivity at low temperature and low cost, could be a promising candidate for the fabrication of electrolytes for fuel-cell applications.
Titulo: The fabrication of a highly conductive ceria-embedded gadolinium-stabilized bismuth oxide nanocomposite solid electrolyte for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells
